Comment: Voter apathy is real, but somewhat of a symptom of congressional ineffectiveness.   Congress has gradually done less and less governing over the years. The last Congress was historically unproductive. This pushes responsibilities that belong to Congress, to the president. The president then governs via executive orders. There is a reason no one thinks about their congressional reps and instead defaults to the president.
